EmailTemplate.name: Q1 Promote Accelerate USA.01-Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Listen to what our Keynote speakers have to say in the Tricentis Accelerate 2013 Conference- we have downloaded video for you and conference highlights.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<!--
-->
Dear {{Lead.First Name}}
Tricentis Accelerate 2013. Accelerate. Innovate. Automate. What a conference! We had a fantastic day, great speakers, and excellent interaction from all participants. We’re sorry we missed you.
But not to worry – you can visit accelerate.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate/> to watch conference highlights and download the recorded sessions. We will also have videos and presentation decks from the conference. <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-accelerate/>
Best Regards,
Wolfgang Platz Founder & Chief Product Officer, Tricentis
If you have any questions or problems watching the videos, please contact us at events@tricentis.com <mailto:events@tricentis.com>
© 2013 TRICENTIS Technology & Consulting. All Rights Reserved.
Tricentis | Leonard-Bernstein-Straße 10 | A-1220 Vienna | Imprint <http://www.tricentis.com/imprint/>
